channel.title: supermetrics on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in supermetrics on DefinIT

item.title: #vROps Webinar 2016 – Part 6 : Understanding vROps SuperMetric & Views
item.description: Sunny just completed the editing and upload of the the latest episode of the vROps Webinar Series 2016. With this we have completed 6 sessions this year. I am glad that we are able to dish out sessions every month and the interest level in these sessions just keeps on growing. Looking forward to deliver more content for the rest of the year. Session Details:-In this episode, we talk about content within vROps.

item.title: #vROps Webinar 2016 – Announcing Part 6 : Understanding vROps SuperMetric & Views
item.description: Time to announce the next part of the year long webinar series on vRealize Operations Manager. This time around, Sunny and I will take you to the world of Content within vROps. I will be honest in saying that this is an ocean in itself and we might not be able to touch upon all the aspects of developing content within vROps. During this effort we plan to start with giving you an overview of the various options available to develop content within vROps.
